mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.specification_no AS "specificationNo", a.orders AS "orders", a.name AS "name", a.file_path AS "filePath", a.specification_group_no AS "specificationGroupNo", a.merchant_no AS "merchantNo", a.specification_group_id AS "SpecificationGroup.id", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN specification_group b ON b.id = a.specification_group_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_specification( id, specification_no, orders, name, file_path, specification_group_no, merchant_no, specification_group_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{specificationNo}, #{orders}, #{name}, #{filePath}, #{specificationGroupNo}, #{merchantNo}, #{SpecificationGroup.id}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE product_specification SET orders = #{orders}, name = #{name}, file_path = #{filePath}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
